
            <h1 class="postTitle">

    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">上周热点回顾（5.19-5.25）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>热点随笔：</p>
<p>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/JimmyZhang/archive/2025/05/19/18883948.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">为什么互联网这么卷？</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/JimmyZhang/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Jimmy Zhang</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/hez2010/archive/2025/05/22/the-new-satori-gc-for-dotnet.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">.NET 的全新低延时高吞吐自适应 GC - Satori GC</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/hez2010/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">hez2010</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/shanyou/archive/2025/05/20/18886030.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">聊一聊 微软的裁员计划对技术团队的冲击</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/shanyou/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">张善友</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/archive/2025/05/21/18888823.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">重磅消息，微软宣布 VS Code Copilot 开源，剑指 Cursor！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">追逐时光者</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/springsource/archive/2025/05/22/18891362.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">会用 AI 的工程师，效率已经拉开差距了 - “ 我们曾经引以为傲的编码能力，正在被改写。”</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/springsource/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">何锦彬</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/12lisu/archive/2025/05/19/18883200.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">数据脱敏的这6种方案，真香！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/12lisu/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">苏三说技术</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/MeteorSeed/archive/2025/05/22/18888581.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">【译】Visual Studio 2022 v17.14 现已正式发布！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/MeteorSeed/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">MeteorSeed</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xueweihan/archive/2025/05/20/18885973.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">7 款让人“上头”的开源小游戏</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xueweihan/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">削微寒</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/archive/2025/05/22/18891942.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">一个基于 C# 编写的事件驱动、具备专业水准的算法交易平台（量化交易引擎）</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">追逐时光者</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/12lisu/archive/2025/05/21/18888400.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">高效缓存的10条军规</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/12lisu/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">苏三说技术</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/archive/2025/05/20/18886037.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">520表白神器</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">程序员晓凡</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lyhabc/archive/2025/05/23/efficient-data-retrieval-methods-in-postgresql-vs-sql-server.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">为何PostgreSQL没有聚集索引？解读两大数据库的设计差异</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lyhabc/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">桦仔</a>)</p>
<p>热点新闻：</p>
<p>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/791853/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">运行35年依然“宝刀未老”，超期服役的哈勃望远镜再续传奇</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/792076/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">57.6万代码撕碎AI编程神话，20%「幽灵包」暗藏漏洞！苹果、微软已中招</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/791854/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Windows首次支持AI时代的C口！微软拉来AI圈三巨头，重新定义操作系统</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/792199/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">15亿美元AI独角兽崩塌，全是印度程序员冒充！微软亚马逊惨遭忽悠</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/792032/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">首个速度达拍赫兹光电晶体管问世</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/792128/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">最强编码模型Claude 4！7小时不间断写代码，连玩24小时宝可梦</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/791781/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">小米SU7 Ultra准车主退订遭遇车企“60天冷静期”，律师：涉嫌合同违约，可要求双倍退还定金</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/791939/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">谷歌全军出击！誓把一切“装”上Gemini，还有XR眼镜引爆全场</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/792178/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">星际之门内部惊人曝光：40万块GPU爆铺！奥特曼千亿豪赌险把电网干崩</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/791850/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">华为折叠电脑，一个苹果微软都想做的产品</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/791858/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">阿里巴巴新总部今天入驻武汉，内部揭秘</a><br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://news.cnblogs.com/n/792125/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">雷军开了小米史上最紧张的一场发布会</a></p>
